page.title: 18SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: { The town has a history of welfare, almshouses used to be available in the town centre and a well_established "Old Folks Home" is available now. This is{STANHOPE HOUSE}and caters for a large number of needy elderly people. The residents have their own room but share all the other facilities; this is run by the County. A "Friends Association" reads, entertains and organises fund_raising events for the Home. Private enterprise runs a similar House at Kingsnorth. The Fairlawn House at{ {STANHOPE}is used for "difficult" children, either physically handicapped or emotionally disturbed, to relieve parents short_term. A small Social Services unit provides nursery, art, craft, and other Group meetings.
